thread.title: BRIEF-Union Acquisition Corp. Securities To Commence Separate Trading

title: BRIEF-Union Acquisition Corp. Securities To Commence Separate Trading
text: 43 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Union Acquisition Corp. Securities To Commence Separate Trading Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Union Acquisition Corp: * UNION ACQUISITION CORP. SECURITIES TO COMMENCE SEPARATE TRADING * UNION ACQUISITION - ‍ORDINARY SHARES, RIGHTS AND WARRANTS WILL BE LISTED ON NYSE UNDER SYMBOLS LTN, LTN RT AND LTN WS, RESPECTIVEL​Y * UNION ACQUISITION - CO’S ‍UNITS NOT SEPARATED WILL CONTINUE TO BE LISTED ON NYSE UNDER SYMBOL LTN.U​ * UNION ACQUISITION CORP - ‍SEPARATE TRADING OF ORDINARY SHARES, RIGHTS AND WARRANTS UNDERLYING CO’S UNITS WOULD COMMENCE ON OR ABOUT MARCH 22, 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
